title: Class 12 Accountancy Board Paper 2026: Question Paper & Detailed Solutions
excerpt: Cracked the Accountancy exam? Download the official Class 12 Accountancy question paper and the expert-verified answer key for February 2026.

seo.metaTitle: Class 12 Accountancy Question Paper & Answer Key 2026
seo.metaDescription: Get the full Class 12 Accountancy 2026 question paper PDF and step-by-step answers. Perfect for checking your score and future practice.

content.text: The Accountancy paper this year was a mix of conceptual depth and practical application. Major focus areas included Partnership Firms, Share Capital, and Cash Flow Statements.
Our experts have prepared a detailed marking scheme to help you calculate your expected score.

content.question: Was the 2026 Accountancy paper difficult?
content.answer: Most students found the Partnership section moderate, while the Analysis of Financial Statements was quite scoring.
